content: introducing the hypnotic tiles afghan by me mikey of the crochet crowd this is using caron cakes yarn featuring the red velvet colour in my design today there are layers within each of the squares that are in the afghan the afghan is made up of 20 squares that are joined as you go and then with a final border around the edge the pattern isn t difficult but has texture which includes layers of texture and with the colour transitions of this yarn the afghan looks amazing pattern details intermediate level 6 mm or size j crochet hook 6 skeins of caron cakes red velvet colour 1 caron cake ball can do 4 complete squares takes 1 caron cake ball to do the final border darning needle to weave in ends afghan is 46″ x 60″ due to the squares used you can make this any size you wish just add or subtract squares out the border will match whatever size you prefer for yourself there are 20 squares and they measure 11″ square each that includes the join as you go round
